CustomField.formula: IF( ! FieloCH__IsActive__c, "Inactive", IF ( FieloCH__FinalDate__c < TODAY() || (ISPICKVAL(FieloCH__CompetitionType__c,'Performance') && FieloCH__Processed__c) || (ISPICKVAL(FieloCH__Mode__c,'Collaborative') && FieloCH__Processed__c), "Finished", IF (FieloCH__InitialDate__c <= TODAY() && FieloCH__FinalDate__c >= TODAY() , "Active", "Future" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Status
